entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve DisplayActionSheet #9591
  • Crash when using a ListView in a RelativeLayout #9590
  • Send mail via System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient isn't working on Android, but on Windows #9587
  • VerticalStackLayout Spacing with hidden children #9586
  • IsEnabled currently doesn't do anything when set on a ContextMenu #9583
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Review guidance for ToolTips and accessibility #9582
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [iOS] Type x:String not found in xmlns http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2009/xaml #9580
  • [Windows] HTML select options are not properly displayed in BlazorWebView #9579
  • Different SplashScreen for Light and Dark Modes #9578
    Backlog
  • Publish MAUI Project with reference iOS #9576
  • Buttons in some pages of a TabbedPage don't grow and instead clip their content #9575
  • Fail to install MAUI from main branch with error "Package signature validation failed" #9573

Closed

  • The name property of an element should not contain class names like 'Microsoft.*.*' or 'Windows.*.*' as these are not usually information. #9066
    .NET 7
  • ResourceDictionary loaded from rd.xaml does not expose any entries #9526
    .NET 7
  • Windows TitleBar button hover color not behaving as expected and position alignment is off when maximimized #9436
  • Navigating to Page which is using DI with DataTemplate causes error #9565
  • App.Close | App.Terminate | App.Restart #9562
  • [Tracking] Consider renaming "💡help wanted" and "💡good first issue" labels #9559
  • FlexLayout AlignContent SpaceAround #9569
  • Custom controls existing in XAML at launch time are not updated via HotReload (.NET MAUI) #8948
    6.0-sr5
  • Can not run project in MacOS #9568
  • Unable to convert instance of type 'Java.Net.URLConnectionInvoker' to type 'Java.Net.HttpURLConnection'. #9571

PullRequests

Created

  • Secondary ButtonMask #9589
  • Updating WinSdkBuildTools to 10.0.22621.1 #9588
    community ✨, 7.0-rc1
  • [Windows] Notify changes in Picker ItemsSource #9584
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22418.3 to 7.0.0-preview1.22419.4 #9577
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix typo in ScrollToRequest.cs #9574
    community ✨
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    community ✨

Merged

  • [C] Align RD.Keys and Values with Count behavior #9581
  • Propagate semantic properties from FlyoutItem #9270
  • Get the Mac Catalyst device tests running #9534
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/testing
  • Fix GC issues and cancel button visibility #9557
    area/a11y, control-button
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22403.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22418.3 #9545
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #9560
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Context menu support for Windows and MacCatalyst #9174
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Enable Window Sizing #4942
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0-rc1
  • Update SkiaSharp to the new stable #9508
    area/single project ☝️, area/drawing ✏️, 7.0-rc1
  • Set the link mode to None when using interpreter #8450
    7.0-rc1
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.13.2.1 to 4.13.2.2 #9317
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Remove GetEffectiveFlowDirection and defer flow direction handling to platforms #9558
  • Moves Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Gtk into the Maui repo #9522
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, .NET 7 Planning
  • [iOS] Fix updating Border Background using VisualStateManager #9553
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
